hook.text: Someone asks how you feel. 'Bad,' you say. But are you anxious, disappointed, lonely, or bored? It matters.

buildup.text: Emotional granularity is the ability to make fine-grained distinctions between similar emotions.

discovery.text: People with high granularity experience emotions more precisely and regulate them more effectively.

twist.text: Expanding your emotional vocabulary literally changes your emotional experience. Words shape feelings.

climax.text: The richer your emotional vocabulary, the more tools you have for understanding and managing how you feel.

punchline.text: Name the emotion precisely and you gain power over it.

quiz.question: What is emotional granularity?
options: The ability to distinguish between similar emotions precisely
Feeling only one emotion at a time
